clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: We may revise these Terms from time to time. The changes will not be retroactive, and the most current version of the Terms will govern our relationship with you

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: By continuing to access or use our Products after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised Terms.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: This service does not track you
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: we don't track you.

case.text: You are not being tracked

clauses.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that periodically delete their logs to prevent user sessions being tracked over time.
clauses.clause_text:
Logging
In order to observe the function of NsLookup, we log some of the web pages you request. This data is not linked to you, and is handled and retained for 7 days by our logging partner Humio.

case.text: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data
clauses.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.
clauses.clause_text: Here are all the ways in which we collect and use your information:

case.text: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

clauses.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: This data is retained for up to 1 hour.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text: we process — but do not store — your IP address.

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website
clauses.description: The service provides users with a complete list of all first and third party cookies its website sets and an explanation of their uses. This information can be valuable for users to make an informed choice whether to allow those cookies.
clauses.clause_text:
Cookies

Our content delivery partner, CloudFlare, uses a cookie to provide critical performance and security services to NsLookup. This cookie will be phased out on 10 May 2021.

case.text: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided

clauses.title: User feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.
clauses.description: The Service takes user suggestions into account to update its Terms.
clauses.clause_text: If you have any questions or feedback regarding this privacy policy, you may contact us.

case.text: Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.

clauses.title: The user is informed about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text: NsLookup follows generally accepted industry standards and maintains reasonable safeguards to atempt to ensure the security, integrity and privacy of the information in NsLookup's possession.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: You're free to stop using our Products at any time.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
clauses.clause_text: he Products may present advertisements for or links to third party websites, products, and/or services ("Third Party Ads"). We are not responsible for the availability of these Third Party Ads, or the images, messages, or other materials contained therein.

case.text: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last updated: 2021-03-25

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: NsLookup will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, special, consequential or exemplary damages or loss of any kind arising from your use of the Products.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: We also reserve the right to suspend or end the Products at any time at our discretion and without notice.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text: These Terms grant you a personal, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to access and use our Products.

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
clauses.clause_text:
You must not:

  • Access our Products through scripts or other means of automation.
  • Scrape our Products.

case.text: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

clauses.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
clauses.clause_text: For example, we may suspend or terminate your use of the Products if you're not complying with these Terms.

case.text: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: Our goal is to provide correct information, but NsLookup cannot guarantee, now will it be liable for the correctness of the content of its Products.

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: Your IP address is used to estimate your geolocation and will not be stored.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
